name: City Runner - Pixel Running Games
description:
Do you like adventure games? Play city running games and step into pixel city where running never stops! Run as far and as fast as you can, avoid all obstacles, collect and upgrade all the help and special powers to stay in the game as long as possible. Play fun rush games and test how fast you really are on the streets of this dangerous city! Running and jumping games promise endless fun and adventure, so try them as soon as possible!

Game features:

Fun game for all ages

High resolution graphics in pixel style

Various characters to choose from

Cool aids and special powers that make it easier to overcome obstacles

Rewards for successfully completed tasks

Run through pixel city, jump, avoid cars and buses, collect diamonds and help and defeat all enemies in this dash game if you want to be a winner. Be a part of this city adventure and play fun rush games that promise a lot of fun! Play exciting parkour games and be the best runner ever!

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eweapons.pixelrunner.runningga...
